name: Painturio
storyline:
When the game begins, one of the players becomes the drawer. He has a few seconds to choose between 3 proposals. Once the word is selected, the drawer has 80 seconds to make other players guess the word. To make suggestions, other players must write their response in the chat. If the answer is wrong, other players can see the guess that was made. On the other hand, if there is only one character difference between the proposed answer and the expected one, then only the player who made the proposal is informed that he is very close to the correct answer.

In each round, it is possible to earn a maximum of 100 points:
For those who must guess the word, their score depends on the time elapsed since the start of the round (70%) and the percentage of players who answered correctly before them (30%).
For the drawer, his score depends on the time of the first player to find (30%), as well as the percentage of players who find the correct answer (70%).
Once the points have been awarded, a new drawer is randomly selected by the game.

The game ends when the number of rounds or the overall time has elapsed. A round ends when all players have drawn once.
For players who are logged into an account, their stats are updated, they can review their game later on their profile page, and earn some things.
summary:
paintur.io is a free online multiplayer game where players have to guess the word that is drawn by one of them within a limited time. The principle is very simple, so it is possible to have fun with the whole family or a group of friends.

This game allows you to showcase your drawing skills, while using your overflowing imagination. Faster you are, more points you earn and you win the game!

The game is playable on any device which can access to internet.
